explains: n. 太阳镜；凸透镜（sunglass 的复数）

sentences.en: These sunglasses are designed to reduce glare.
sentences.cn: 这些太阳镜是为减少刺眼的强光而设计的。

sentences.en: She sat up and removed her designer sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 她坐起来，摘掉她的时尚墨镜。

sentences.en: I wore sunglasses all the time and people thought it was an affectation.
sentences.cn: 我一直戴着墨镜，别人认为是做作。
